sysevent_in_email_action.description: This inbound email action behaves the same as Update Incident, but additionally will reopen a closed incident if the email subject contains "please reopen". In reopening the incident, the incident state will be set to "2" and "The caller did not feel that this issue was resolved" will be added to the incident as a work note.
sysevent_in_email_action.name: Update Incident (BP)
